Text: Lord of unfailing love, Your beloved children ask that You keep us in Your heart and pour out Your mercy. [t] For all our hope rests in Your heavenly grace. [*] That You will keep us under Your constant protection, now and forever, through Jesus Christ.
Changes: 2024-02-03 - Paul Prins: Updated this prayer to stylistically align.
2022-01-29 - Paul Prins: First translation of this prayer.
